items.content_html: The Chrome tab extension is a lightweight tool that enables users to quickly and easily extract the title and URL of each open tab in their Chrome browser. This extension is perfect for anyone who wants to save their current browsing session or keep a record of the websites they visit.
items.title: alwaz-shahid/extenstion-chrome-get-tabs-data: The Chrome tab extension is a lightweight tool that enables users to quickly and easily extract the title and URL of each open tab in their Chrome browser. This extension is perfect for anyone who wants to save their current browsing session or keep a record of the websites they visit.
